text:
Mom, Phineas and Ferb are
doing something with a logo.
Oh, hey, Candace.

Because you're such
a great sister,

we want to give you a
Theme Song Takeover.
Oh.

Wait, are you trying
to distract me

while you sneak the
Lake Nose Monster
into a hot tub or something?

No, you just deserve
something for yourself.
[music playing]
Fine.

But if I'm going to take
over your theme song,
I'm going to use it to bust you.
Hit it, Perry.

(SINGING) There's 104 days of
summer vacation, and this year,

I won't be so trusting You
might not have noticed,

but I've got this fixation Get
ready for some brother busting

My plans are dressing myself
to look like an appliance,

hearing everything you
say In the last year,

I got way into science Now
sequencing your DNA Disguise

a microphone Learn how to fly a
drone or hiding cameras in a pie

Make sure your plans
are blown Using a robot
clone Training Perry as a spy
Training Perry as a spy?
Yeah, I went too far.

I mean, can you imagine
a platypus as a spy?
[laughter]
Anyway--

(SINGING) When you get caught,
Mom will finally believe me

She'll shower me
with tons of praise

She'll probably say, boy,
how could you deceive me?

I'm giving Candace
what she craves

Have my own town parade
A statue will be made
The President will know my name
Candace

(SINGING) I'll win a big
award United with a sword,

and you'll finally
get all the blame
Cool cage.

(SINGING) It's time for mom to
see what's been happening You'll

be grounded by the time I'm
through So watch it now, cause

Phineas and Ferb, I'm gonna
bust you, too So watch out now,

cause Phineas and Ferb,
I'm gonna bust you two.
It's true.

Mom, Candace just
sang the most amazing
cover of our theme song.
You little-- oh, thanks.
[guitar chord]
